name: Pillar of Fire
desc:
A pillar of fire 100 feet tall descends onto a 20 foot radius area centered on a point you can see within range. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d6 fire damage. Creatures that succeed take half damage.

The pillar of fire remains until the start of your next turn, continually pouring down from above. Any creature that enters the pillar that did not already take damage from the spell must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d6 fire damage, halved on a success.
author: CrusaderDroid
